title: Sound On: Rep. Garamendi, Russian Sanctions
itunes:title: Sound On: Rep. Garamendi, Russian Sanctions
description:
Guests: Rep. John Garamendi, a Democrat representing California's 3rd congressional district.

Bloomberg's David Westin also spoke to Bank of America Chairman and CEO, Brian Moynahan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
